meta.title: Ready-Made App Solutions — Aviniti
meta.description: Browse 8 pre-built software systems ready to deploy: delivery apps, gym management, kindergarten systems, and more. Starting from $8,000.
meta.og_description: Browse 8 pre-built software systems ready to deploy: delivery apps, gym management, kindergarten systems, and more. Starting from $8,000.

page.label: Solutions
page.title: Ready-Made Solutions
page.subtitle: Launch faster with pre-built, customizable solutions — each one battle-tested and ready to deploy
page.cta_subtitle: Can't find exactly what you need? Let's build something tailored for your business.

delivery-app-system.name: Delivery App System
delivery-app-system.tagline: Complete multi-vendor delivery platform with 3 integrated apps
delivery-app-system.description: Full delivery management system with an Owner Dashboard for managing operations, a Customer/Vendor App for businesses to manage their orders and products, and a Driver App with route optimization and multi-delivery batching. Built on Google Maps API with real-time tracking.

apps.name: Owner Dashboard
apps.description: Complete control center for managing drivers, customers, deliveries, backups, analytics, and reports. Full Google Maps integration with onboarding/offboarding management.
features: Google Maps integration with real-time delivery tracking
Live delivery tracking and ETA updates

apps.name: Customer/Vendor App
apps.description: For businesses that need delivery services. Upload orders, products, and customer base. Add orders by phone number for returning customers, pick products from catalog, choose delivery type (fast, standard, scheduled).
features: Bulk order upload and import functionality
Vendor analytics and order tracking dashboard

apps.name: Driver App
apps.description: Shows available pickups, delivery locations, estimated revenue per delivery. Supports multi-delivery batching for geographic areas — deliver multiple orders in one trip. Best route calculation via Google Maps API.
features: Automatic best route calculation via Google Maps
Delivery status updates and proof of delivery

differentiation: Google Maps real-time integration with live tracking
Multi-delivery batching algorithm to maximize driver efficiency
Automated route optimization reducing delivery times
Vendor self-service portal eliminating manual order entry
Real-time revenue tracking and driver incentive management
customization: Custom branding and theme customization
Legacy system integration and data migration
Additional payment gateways (local and international)
Multi-language support for regional expansion
whats_included: Google Maps API setup and configuration
Admin dashboard with full management access

kindergarten-management.name: Kindergarten Management System
kindergarten-management.tagline: All-in-one nursery management with 3 connected apps
kindergarten-management.description: Complete nursery management built from our real Nay Nursery project. Admin dashboard for operations, a Staff App with geofencing check-in, and a Parent App where families see everything about their child's day. Staff adopted it without any training.

apps.name: Admin Dashboard
apps.description: Operations and management hub for nursery directors. Complete operational control including enrollment management, billing cycles, staff scheduling, activity reporting, parent communication, and attendance analytics. Developed from real Nay Nursery operations.

apps.name: Staff App
apps.description: Mobile app for teachers and caregivers. Geofencing-based check-in/out, incident reporting, daily activity logging with photos/videos, and direct messaging with parents. No training required — intuitive interface adopted immediately.
features: Manual attendance marking with time stamps
Photo and video upload to secure cloud
Direct messaging with parents and admin
Child observation notes and behavior tracking

apps.name: Parent App
apps.description: Mobile app for families. Real-time updates on child's day, attendance confirmation, fee payments, photo gallery from activities, and direct messaging with staff. Full visibility and peace of mind.
features: Real-time daily activity updates and logs
Photo and video gallery from daily activities
Direct messaging with teachers and admin

differentiation: Geofencing staff check-in requiring no manual intervention
Intuitive UX proven in real Nay Nursery with zero training required
Real-time parent updates eliminating daily pickup questions
Built from real nursery experience ensuring all critical workflows are covered
customization: Custom branding with nursery logo and colors
Curriculum module customization (Montessori, IB, etc.)
Transportation tracking integration
Meal planning and dietary tracking add-on
whats_included: Admin dashboard with all management features
Full source code and customization documentation

hypermarket-management.name: Hypermarket Management System
hypermarket-management.tagline: Enterprise retail operations with POS, loyalty, and multi-branch support
hypermarket-management.description: End-to-end retail solution: POS system, customer loyalty app with smart shopping lists and in-store product finder, inventory and warehouse management, and multi-branch connectivity. Scales from single store to multi-location chains.
hypermarket-management.price_note: Price scales with number of branches and operational complexity

apps.name: POS System
apps.description: Point of sale with barcode and card processing. Full point-of-sale system with barcode scanning, receipt printing, returns processing, cash management, and shift-end reconciliation. Hardware-agnostic and works on tablets or dedicated terminals.
features: Barcode and QR code scanning integration

apps.name: Customer Loyalty App
apps.description: Smart shopping lists and in-store product finder. Customer-facing app with order history, smart shopping lists that sync across devices, in-store product finder showing exact shelf location, loyalty card integration, and reorder favorites. Replaces physical fridge shopping lists.
features: Digital loyalty card and QR code scanning
In-store product finder with shelf location
Push notifications for deals and promotions

apps.name: Inventory & Warehouse Management
apps.description: Stock levels, reorder alerts, and warehouse operations. Complete inventory tracking with real-time stock levels, automated reorder point alerts, supplier management, goods receipt workflows, and full audit trails. Warehouse staff can process receipts and manage transfers.
features: Real-time stock level tracking across warehouse
Automated reorder point alerts and suggestions
Product expiry tracking and FIFO management
Complete audit trail and transaction history

apps.name: Multi-Branch Dashboard
apps.description: Centralized management for chain operations. Unified dashboard for managing multiple store locations. Inter-branch stock transfers, centralized reporting, branch comparison analytics, synchronized product catalog, and unified pricing. Real-time visibility across all locations.
features: Staff allocation and scheduling across branches

differentiation: In-store product finder feature eliminating customer search time
Multi-branch real-time sync ensuring pricing and stock consistency
Smart shopping lists replacing traditional paper and fridge notes
Unified inventory across locations enabling efficient stock distribution
Loyalty program with personalized offers driving repeat visits and basket size
customization: Hardware POS integration (receipt printers, card terminals)
ERP system integration for financial data sync
Custom reporting and business intelligence dashboards
Supplier portal for automated ordering
E-commerce bridge connecting online and offline inventory
whats_included: Complete POS software with hardware consultation
Inventory management system with warehouse module
60 days of post-launch support and training
Full source code and technical documentation

office-management.name: Office Management Suite
office-management.tagline: Appointment booking, CRM, and staff management in one dashboard
office-management.description: Streamlined management dashboard for appointment-based businesses — clinics, salons, consultancies. Booking system, client CRM, staff scheduling, and payment tracking. Similar to our Secretary product, optimized for simplicity.

apps.name: Management Dashboard
apps.description: All-in-one office operations hub. Single dashboard for appointment scheduling, client relationship management, staff scheduling, payment processing, and business analytics. Built from real Secretary product deployment in clinics and salons. Minimal learning curve.
features: Client CRM with contact history and preferences
Integration with SMS and email notifications

differentiation: Works for any appointment-based business (clinics, salons, consultancies, legal offices)
Minimal training required — proven in real Secretary deployments
Built from real Secretary product ensuring all critical workflows
Clean, mobile-responsive interface suitable for any professional setting
customization: Custom branding with company logo and colors
Additional third-party integrations
Multi-location support for businesses with multiple offices

gym-management.name: Gym & Fitness Management
gym-management.description: The most comprehensive gym management system: Owner Dashboard, Receptionist App, Staff App for maintenance, Shop & Bar POS, Trainer App with AI video analysis, and a Customer App with QR-based equipment tracking. From membership management to AI-powered form correction.
gym-management.price_note: Scales with branch count and legacy system integration

apps.name: Owner Dashboard
apps.description: Gym operations and financial control center. Complete owner/GM view with subscription management, revenue analytics, staff oversight, branch management, equipment inventory, and reporting. Real-time KPIs for running the business.

apps.name: Receptionist App
apps.description: Front desk member check-in and registration. Tablet-based app for check-in/check-out, membership renewal, payment processing, walk-in registration, and day pass sales. Integrates with member account system for seamless experience.
features: Payment processing for renewals and day passes
Walk-in visitor registration and day pass sales
Account balance and payment history lookup
Member ID card generation and printing
Quick access to member contact information
Walk-in counter and daily revenue tracking

apps.name: Maintenance & Facility Staff App
apps.description: Equipment and facility maintenance scheduling. Mobile app for maintenance staff to manage equipment maintenance tasks, cleaning checklists, facility status reports, and maintenance history. Keeps gym running smoothly.
features: Daily cleaning checklist with task assignment
Equipment status reporting and photo documentation
Maintenance task assignment and completion tracking
Equipment repair history and downtime logging

apps.name: Shop & Bar POS
apps.description: Supplement and beverage sales with credit system. Point-of-sale system for selling supplements, clothing, equipment, and bar items (protein shakes, energy bars). Credit system tied to member accounts allowing charges to membership billing.
features: Member account credit system and charges
Inventory tracking for shop and bar items
Sales reporting and popular items analysis

apps.name: Trainer App
apps.description: Session scheduling, workout planning, and AI form analysis. Professional trainer app with client assignment, PT session booking, workout plan creation from client history, AI video analysis of training form, session tracking, and member pitching. Can see unassigned members to pitch PT packages.
features: AI video analysis of training form during session
Session tracking and client progress notes
View unassigned members for PT package pitching
Complex training session logging with exercise variants

apps.name: Customer App
apps.description: Equipment tracking, PT booking, and progress management. Mobile app for gym members with digital gym passport, subscription info, training history, PT session booking with trainer selection, QR scan on equipment for session logging, find assigned workout equipment, and progress tracking.
features: Digital gym passport with access status
PT session booking with trainer selection
QR scan on equipment to start session timer
Find specific equipment in gym via scan or search

differentiation: QR code on every equipment for automatic session tracking and usage logging
AI video analysis for real-time training form correction during PT sessions
Credit system linking supplement shop to member accounts and billing
6 specialized apps for every gym role — from owner to member
Trainer can see unassigned members to pitch PT packages and grow revenue
Customer app finds exact equipment from trainer-assigned workouts with location
customization: Hardware integration (card readers, check-in kiosks)
Multiple branch management with different equipment catalogs
Custom AI models for specific exercises and form analysis
Payment gateway options (local and international)
Integration with existing membership software or billing systems
whats_included: 6 mobile/web apps (iOS, Android, and web versions)
QR code generation and gym equipment labeling guide
AI video analysis module with exercise library
POS hardware consultation for shop/bar setup
Equipment QR code labeling and installation guide
Admin training and staff onboarding materials
Full source code and technical documentation

airbnb-marketplace.name: Property Rental Platform
airbnb-marketplace.tagline: Your own Airbnb-style marketplace — for rent and sale
airbnb-marketplace.description: Complete rental and property sales marketplace. Host app for listing properties, Guest app for booking and purchasing, and Admin dashboard for platform management. Not just rentals — supports property sales too.

apps.name: Host App
apps.description: Property listing and booking management. Complete tools for property owners to list rental and sale properties, manage availability, handle bookings, set pricing, communicate with guests, collect reviews, and track earnings.
features: Property listing creation with photos and descriptions
Booking request handling and approval workflow
Dynamic pricing and seasonal rate management

apps.name: Guest App
apps.description: Search, booking, and purchase for renters and buyers. App for guests to search properties with map view, place bookings with secure payment (escrow), contact hosts, leave reviews, save favorites, and make purchase offers for sale properties.
features: Property detail pages with photos and descriptions
Review and rating system for properties and hosts

apps.name: Admin Dashboard
apps.description: Platform management and oversight. Complete platform management including user verification, content moderation, booking oversight, dispute resolution, commission management, and financial reporting.

differentiation: Supports both rental AND property sales — broader market reach
Map-based search for intuitive property discovery
Escrow payment protection ensuring security for both parties
Host self-service onboarding eliminating manual verification delays
customization: Payment gateway selection (local and international options)
Custom booking rules and cancellation policies
Multi-currency support for international properties
Property verification workflow customization
whats_included: Admin dashboard with all management features

hair-transplant-ai.name: Hair Transplant AI Analyzer
hair-transplant-ai.tagline: AI-powered hair analysis and clinic management
hair-transplant-ai.description: Built from our real HairVision project. Receptionist dashboard for appointment booking, patient history, and medication tracking. Doctor AI tool: take 4 photos of a patient's head and get follicle counts, donor area mapping, and transplant planning. Progress tracking at 7, 30, and 90 days post-transplant.

apps.name: Receptionist Dashboard
apps.description: Appointment and patient management. Web-based dashboard for scheduling appointments, maintaining patient profiles, tracking medical history and medications, and managing session context. Ensures doctors have complete patient information at each visit.
features: Medical history and health conditions tracking
Session context and previous treatment notes

apps.name: Doctor AI Analysis Tool
apps.description: AI-powered hair analysis and transplant planning. Sophisticated tool for doctors to capture 4 standard head photos and receive AI analysis: follicle density counts, donor area mapping, transplant planning visualization, graft estimation. Progress tracking at clinical intervals (7, 30, 90 days post-procedure). Built from real Jarwan Transplant Clinic deployment.
features: AI follicle density analysis and counting

differentiation: Real AI follicle counting from photos — not simulations or estimates
Automated donor area mapping eliminating manual measurement
Progress tracking at clinical intervals (7, 30, 90 days) for outcome monitoring
Built from real clinic deployment at Jarwan Transplant ensuring medical accuracy
customization: Clinic branding with logo and colors
Additional AI analysis models for different procedures
Integration with existing patient management systems
Multi-clinic support for clinic chains
whats_included: Receptionist dashboard for full patient management
Doctor AI analysis tool with photo capture
Patient data migration assistance from existing systems
Full source code and technical documentation

barbershop-management.name: Elite Barbershop Management
barbershop-management.tagline: Professional barbershop system with AI style analysis
barbershop-management.description: Complete barbershop management: Owner dashboard for CRM, staff management, and analytics. Receptionist mini-dashboard for check-in/out. Barber App with sophisticated AI hairstyle and beard analysis — professional-grade, more advanced than consumer apps. Can integrate directly with Calibre so customers who download Calibre get access to your salon.

apps.name: Owner Dashboard
apps.description: Business operations and analytics. Complete CRM and management dashboard with staff scheduling, appointment booking, client relationship management, analytics, revenue reporting, product inventory, and marketing tools. Full visibility into business operations.
features: Client CRM with complete profile history
Client retention metrics and repeat visit tracking
Performance metrics by barber and service type

apps.name: Receptionist App
apps.description: Client check-in and appointment management. Mini-dashboard for front desk operations including client check-in/check-out, appointment booking, walk-in queue management, payment processing, and quick client lookup.
features: Walk-in queue and wait time management
Quick client lookup by phone or name
Daily client count and throughput tracking

apps.name: Barber App
apps.description: Professional-grade AI style analysis. Mobile app for barbers with complete client profiles, appointment schedule, service history, and professional-grade AI hairstyle and beard analysis. Advanced beyond consumer apps — AI recommends styles based on client appearance and preferences. Direct Calibre integration for customer acquisition.
features: Complete client profile with appearance data
Professional AI hairstyle analysis and matching
AI beard style analysis and recommendations
Advanced AI style suggestions surpassing consumer apps
Style history per client with photos
Direct Calibre app integration for client discovery

differentiation: Professional-grade AI style analysis surpassing consumer apps like Calibre
Direct Calibre app integration allowing customers to discover and book with your salon
Complete client appearance history for consistent, personalized service
Sophisticated beard and hairstyle matching AI for premium consultations
Receptionist mini-dashboard ensuring efficient front desk operations
customization: Custom branding with shop logo and colors
Additional AI style models for specific hair types or ethnicities
Multi-location support for barbershop chains
Loyalty and rewards program customization
whats_included: 3 apps: Owner Dashboard (web), Receptionist App (tablet), Barber App (mobile)
AI style analysis setup and model configuration
Calibre app integration documentation and setup
Full source code and technical documentation

detail.apps_subtitle: Each component is purpose-built for a specific role
